author: fradamt
content:
https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/4558#issuecomment-3439754755

The same implementation complexity mentioned here should also apply to gloas, due to removing the "self-verifiability" of columns. Wondering if someone has already had to deal with this?

Something that's not very clear to me is, wouldn't you have the same exact problem if someone sent you a block or an attestation for a branch you don't know, so that you can't figure out if the signer was actually a proposer/attester on that branch? Is this worse because it can happen on the canonical branch?
